name: Cupcake or Sandwich Flag Picks
description:
12 Cupcake or Sandwich Flags - £2 plus p&p

Double sided flags measure 3 x 2 cms approx and come on bamboo picks. 8cms tall including flag. 

Discounts are available for larger quantities, just message me with any enquiries x

name: Christmas Bauble Gift Box
description:
Giving a bauble as a gift?

Our boxes are a super cute way to add that little extra something!

£1.50 per box, each box holds one bauble

name: Nollaig Chridheil Christmas Baubles
description:
All baubles are decorated by hand here at Lewisian Nice and come with a coordinating Christmas Themed Ribbon.

Currently available in red with either Gold or White writing. Nollaig Chridheil is Merry Christmas in Scottish Gaelic!

£1 per bauble


I also do personalised baubles with dates, names, baby's first Christmas etc. These can be single or double sided. £2 for single sided and £2.50 for double sided.

Gift Box is available and is £1 extra

name: Harris Tweed Bunting
description:
Made to Order in your choice of colours!

Bunting pictured is Red & Cream Harris Tweed. Single sided, 14 flags with a raw scalloped edge (they've not been sewn) on approx 3.5m of white lace trim and is priced at £14. 



I make bunting to order with prices as follows: 

Harris Tweed Bunting is £1 per flag. Single sided and trimmed with coordinating ruffled lace.

Vintage Fabric Bunting is 50p per flag unless otherwise stated. Single sided and trimmed with coordinating ruffled lace.

Vintage Paper Bunting is 50p per flag unless otherwise stated. Single sided and trimmed with coordinating ruffled lace.

Personalisation is available at an extra 50p per flag with each flag taking one letter.

Discounts are available for large quantities.

Prices are excluding p&p

Please use the Contact Us form at the top of the page to enquire about an order x
